name: data object name
description: this is the template file for the generic data object type

collection.statement: Only legally compliant data is collected

maintenance.statement: Data is cleaned, combined, masked/anonymized where possible

storage.statement: Only data needing storage is stored

usage.statement: Only people who need access to data have access

publication.statement: Data is only shared to legally compliant partners

archive.statement: Only data needing archiving is archived

erasure.statement: Data is erased as soon as possible
